caption.center: DAVID LEE RICHARDSON, III, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Duval County. L. P. Haddock, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
David Lee Richardson, III, pro se, Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, and Giselle Denise Lylen, Assistant Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
ALLEN, VAN NORTWICK, AND ROBERTS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILEDPage 1
